name: package-rater-monorepo
author: Aditya Sivathanu, Kevin Chang, Ellis Selznick

scripts.build:production: yarn workspaces foreach -A --parallel --topological --exclude @package-rater/app run build && yarn workspace @package-rater/app run build:production
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -A run clean && rm -rf coverage node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @package-rater/app dev" "yarn workspace @package-rater/server dev" "yarn workspace @package-rater/shared dev" "yarn workspace @package-rater/cli dev"
scripts.format: yarn prettier --write app/*.{js,tsx,json,html} app/src cli server/*.{json,mjs,ts} server/src/**/*.ts shared '*.json' '.github/workflows/*.yml'
scripts.lint: cd app && yarn lint; cd ../cli && yarn lint; cd ../server && yarn lint; cd ../shared && yarn lint
scripts.quality: yarn format && yarn lint && yarn clean
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -A --parallel run test && yarn test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: yarn backup-packages && yarn start-server && wait-on -t 20s http://0.0.0.0:3000 && yarn workspace @package-rater/app run test:e2e; EXIT_CODE=$?; yarn stop-server && yarn restore-packages; exit $EXIT_CODE
